00025 #ifndef CPPULLEYJOINT_H
00026 #define CPPULLEYJOINT_H
00027 
00028 #ifdef __cplusplus
00029 extern "C" {
00030 #endif
00031     
00032     const cpConstraintClass *cpPulleyJointGetClass();
00033     
00034     extern cpFloat cp_min_pulley_len;
00035     extern cpFloat cp_min_correction;
00036     
00037     /*
00038      cpPulleyJoint
00039      
00040      -First two parameters (a, b) are the bodies on the ends of the "rope"
00041      -Third parameter (c) is the body the pulley is attached to
00042      -anchor1 and anchor2 are relative attach pts on the first two bodies
00043      -anchor3a and anchor3b are the points that represent the pulley rope's enter/exit
00044      -anchor1 --> anchor3a
00045      -anchor2 --> anchor3b
00046      -ratio simulates a block & tackle, one side extends faster than the other
00047      */
00048     typedef struct cpPulleyJoint
00049     {
00050         cpConstraint constraint;
00051         cpBody *c;
00052         cpVect anchr1, anchr2;
00053         cpVect anchr3a, anchr3b;
00054         
00055         cpFloat dist1, dist2;
00056         cpFloat max1, max2;
00057         
00058         cpFloat ratio;
00059         
00060         cpVect r1, r2;
00061         
00062         cpVect u1;
00063         cpVect u2;
00064         
00065         cpFloat constant;
00066         
00067         // Effective masses
00068         cpFloat pulleyMass;
00069         cpFloat limitMass1;
00070         cpFloat limitMass2;
00071         
00072         // Impulses for accumulation
00073         cpFloat jnAcc;
00074         cpFloat jnAccLim1;
00075         cpFloat jnAccLim2;
00076         
00077         // States are no fun... any way to get rid of this?
00078         int state;
00079         int limitState1;
00080         int limitState2;
00081     } cpPulleyJoint;
00082     
00083     cpPulleyJoint *cpPulleyJointAlloc(void);
00084     cpPulleyJoint *cpPulleyJointInit(cpPulleyJoint *joint,
00085                                      cpBody* a, cpBody* b, cpBody* c,
00086                                      cpVect anchor1, cpVect anchor2,
00087                                      cpVect anchor3a, cpVect anchor3b,
00088                                      cpFloat ratio);
00089     cpConstraint *cpPulleyJointNew(cpBody* a, cpBody* b, cpBody* c,
00090                                    cpVect anchor1, cpVect anchor2,
00091                                    cpVect anchor3a, cpVect anchor3b,
00092                                    cpFloat ratio);
00093     
00094     CP_DefineConstraintProperty(cpPulleyJoint, cpVect, anchr1, Anchr1);
00095     CP_DefineConstraintProperty(cpPulleyJoint, cpVect, anchr2, Anchr2);
00096     CP_DefineConstraintProperty(cpPulleyJoint, cpFloat, ratio, Ratio);
00097         
00098 #ifdef __cplusplus
00099 }
00100 #endif
00101 
00102 #endif //CPPULLEYJOINT_H
